languages.text: "Рискуем доломать, окончательно, но попробовать можно. Но практика показывает, что повторные пытки узников в таком состоянии редко дают желаемый эффект".
"We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."
languages.original_text: "Рискуем доломать, окончательно, но попробовать можно. Но практика показывает, что повторные пытки узников в таком состоянии редко дают желаемый эффект".

traits.locale_text: "We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extended practice shows that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."
"We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extended practice shows that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."
"We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."
"We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."
"We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."
"We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."
"We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."

languages.text: "Versuchen können wir's, wobei wir damit Gefahr laufen, ihn dauerhaft zu brechen. Die Erfahrung lehrt uns, dass die anhaltende Folter von Gefangenen in diesem Zustand nur selten den gewünschten Effekt hat."
languages.original_text: "We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."

traits.locale_text: "Versuchen können wir's, wobei wir damit Gefahr laufen, ihn dauerhaft zu brechen. Die Erfahrung lehrt uns, dass die anhaltende Folter von Gefangenen in diesem Zustand nur selten den gewünschten Effekt hat."

languages.text: « Nous pouvons essayer, mais nous risquons de le briser définitivement. Nos expériences passées nous ont montré que la torture répétée de prisonniers dans cet état a rarement l'effet escompté. »
languages.original_text: "We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."

traits.locale_text: « Nous pouvons essayer, mais nous risquons de le briser définitivement. Nos expériences passées nous ont montré que la torture répétée de prisonniers dans cet état a rarement l'effet escompté. »

languages.text: «Podemos intentarlo, aunque corremos el riesgo de causarle daños permanentes. Mis años de experiencia me han enseñado que la tortura reiterada de prisioneros en su estado casi nunca tiene el efecto deseado».
languages.original_text: "We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."

traits.locale_text: «Podemos intentarlo, aunque corremos el riesgo de causarle daños permanentes. Mis años de experiencia me han enseñado que la tortura reiterada de prisioneros en su estado casi nunca tiene el efecto deseado».

languages.text: 「奴を完全に壊してしまうリスクはありますが、やってみることはできます。このような状態の囚人に拷問を繰り返したところで望むような結果を得られることがほとんどないことは、数多くの経験からも明らかです」
languages.original_text: "We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."

traits.locale_text: 「奴を完全に壊してしまうリスクはありますが、やってみることはできます。このような状態の囚人に拷問を繰り返したところで望むような結果を得られることがほとんどないことは、数多くの経験からも明らかです」

languages.text: “我们确实可以再试一次，不过这样可能会把他彻底弄坏。大量实践经验表明，在这种情况下，反复折磨囚犯很难得到预期的效果。”
languages.original_text: "We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."

traits.locale_text: “我们确实可以再试一次，不过这样可能会把他彻底弄坏。大量实践经验表明，在这种情况下，反复折磨囚犯很难得到预期的效果。”

languages.text: "Deneyebiliriz elbette. Gerçi adamın kalıcı olarak aklını yitirmesi riski de var. Geniş kapsamlı uygulamalar, bu durumdaki mahkûmların tekrar tekrar işkenceye tabi tutulmalarının nadiren istenen sonuca ulaştığını gösteriyor."
languages.original_text: "We can certainly try, although we risk breaking him permanently. Extensive practice has shown that repeated torture of prisoners in this condition rarely has the desired effect."
